sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const AboutUs = () => { return (

About ARMS Portal

ARMS (Academic Resource Management System) is a centralized web platform developed to help students, faculty, and academic administrators manage and access essential academic resources such as:

  • Department-wise and semester-wise notes
  • Up-to-date syllabus for different courses
  • Year-wise question papers to help with exam preparation

This platform supports **multiple universities**, allowing centralized storage, easy uploads, and secure access. It is especially useful for:

  • Students - Find resources quickly for any subject or semester
  • Teachers - Upload and update resources anytime
  • Admins - Manage universities, departments, and uploads

Our Mission

To simplify academic resource sharing and make learning more accessible and organized for every student in every university.

© {new Date().getFullYear()} ARMS Portal | Developed by Gautav & Team

); }; export default AboutUs;
